triage_summary: Root cause: from_dict() uses str() to coerce timestamp fields without type validation, accepting int/list/dict which become meaningless strings. Risk: data integrity and security issues with invalid timestamp data in storage.
verification_targets: valid ISO string created_at is accepted
null/missing created_at defaults to current time
implementation_summary: Added type validation for timestamp fields in from_dict(). Fields must be string or None/missing. Invalid types (int, list, dict) now raise ValueError with clear message. 9 new regression tests added, all 118 tests pass.
